Package com.example.jianwei.suteraproject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddKain
    This class add new menu item into the database, This involves opening phone gallery getting image uri, Involves receiving text from edittext and upload all to database under the title item
    AdminLogin
    This class is solely for admin to login, This involves receiving email and password from edit text, Check with firebase for authorisation under "admin", If the user exist, they are allow to proceed to the item menu activity page
    AdminMenu
    This class is for the main menu for admin, There are only four button in this page, Each button clicked will redirect to a new activity page
    AppCompatPreferenceActivity  
    Cart
    Calculate total cart items value, Add new items into cart
    DeleteActivity
    THis class is for admin to delete order form from the database
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    HelpActivity
    This class is for users to send complaint to the admin, This involves recording subject and complain message, Then open email app in the phone and automatically paste the message
    Kain
    Getter and setter for menu item
    LoginActivity
    This class is for ordinary users to login into the app, This involves receiving email and password from the EditText, Then check with firebase for authorisation, If the user exist, the user is redirected to a new activity page
    MainActivity
    This page is mainly for sign up purpose, Receive email and password from user and double check with database, If user exist, cannot sign up, If user dont exist, register and redirect to item menu activity page
    MenuActivity
    Item menu.
    MenuActivity.KainViewHolder
    Recycle view for items menu
    OpenOrders
    Retrieve order form data from firebase, Display order form in recyclerview
    OpenOrders.OrderViewHolder
    Recycler view for customers order forms.
    Order
    Getter and setters for order forms
    Product
    Getter for ordered item
    SingleKainActivity
    When a item in the item menu is clicked, user will be redirected to a single item activity page, Image, name, description and price of the chosen item will be displayed here, User will then be allowed to add item to cart, Admin will be able to access this page too for deleting item
    TestingCheckout
    After paypal is successful,the owner will be asked to input delivery address, Once the button is pressed, the order will be uploaded, Uploaded data include email address, item name and delivery address
    ViewCart
    Shopping cart is shown here, Total Expenditure is displayed here, Reset button will reset the whole shopping cart, Checkout Button will redirect the user to the paypal page to make payment
